input_email_body:
Subject: Problems with the Website - Crashes

I am experiencing issues with the website, including crashes, error messages, and data loss. I suspect this may be due to incompatible updates or security vulnerabilities. I have already tried restarting the system, using old backups, and going through troubleshooting guides, but the problem persists My name is Jane Smith.. I would greatly appreciate your help in resolving this issue as soon as possible. You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.
